entries.journal_entry_description: Darth Vader is curious about the pilot who destroyed the Death Star. Help him satisfy that hunger for knowledge.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Lord Vader has contracted the services of a special agent to watch for any Rebel activity connected to recent events on Tatooine and Yavin IV. That agent has informed him of a Rebel courier that is destined for Naboo. You will find that courier and destroy him. His last known location was in Narmle on Rori.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Seeking further information to corroborate the data carried by the courier, you are to seek the assistance of the Emperor's Hand, Mara Jade. She is currently investigating the Death Watch Bunker on Endor.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: With the help of Mara Jade, Darth Vader has located the recipient of the courier's message, Ahnyx Pollard. He's somewhere around Moenia on Naboo. Seek him out, learn what he knows, and then destroy him.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Return to Darth Vader at the Emperor's Retreat on Naboo.
